nodes.body: Weather. Ex: Srung thabs mdor bsdus phyogs gcig tu bkod pa [nas sad ser btsa’ than sogs srung thabs mdor bsdus] (W3829), Dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i sgo nas dus min gyi kha char gcod pa'i man ngag me rlung 'khyil ba dang / ser ba bsrung ba'i ched gzhi bdag la gtor ma gtong tshul bcas.
nodes.title: About Bad weather
